translation.Message_0_Page_0: Oh, me? I was a piping young man who joined the Irish Army back in 1980. Couldn't you tell?
translation.Message_0_Page_1: Years later, I would meet a commander who would invite me to their budding militia the <color=red>Irish Freedom Republic</color>. This was a little bit before the turned came.
translation.Message_0_Page_2: My job here is mostly tactics. However, in recent days we've began to suffer losses and now I just sit here all day playing chess with myself and reminiscing about old times. Thanks for listening, by the way.
